name: Painting with an Idiot
description:
You are in a painting competition where you must recreate a piece but luckily your unhelpful friend, who is AI, would like to help.

Try to recreate the image in the top left before the time runs out!

Getting empty tiles correct = 100pts

All other correct tiles = 10pts

Transcript in case sound is bugged: "So you have to recreate the image huh. Worry not for I Ai am here. Hold up. Who put that there? You never saw that. Anyway I'll just give you a good, old, totally by the rules head-start."
